edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo

Class Authorship

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.SparqlService
      • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.VivoSparqlService
        • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.Article
          • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.Authorship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorAuthorCitation

    public class Authorship
extends Article
    Authorship and co-authorship accessors; combines citation data from PubMed with authorship data from VIVO. Methods returning sets do the real work, methods returning arrays are for convenience
    Author:
    Hugh HJD 2012-04-26 add accessors for authors for identification
